TopicTitle: My fairings have no ejection force

Articles.Content:
I've googled this a lot and even been told on Reddit that it's a non issue but it's a big issue for me and has been for a while, basically when I stage the fairings my ship just sits inside the decoupled fairings sometimes even getting stuck.

I remember a while back they'd decouple just fine and fly into space in a safe direction, I'm running the latest update and using the KW fairings. Please help.
There has been an issue with ejection forces (on decouplers too) on 0.24. It at least APPEARS that issue has been fixed in 0.25, though I guess we'll know for sure when it comes out.

There has been an issue with ejection forces (on decouplers too) on 0.24. It at least APPEARS that issue has been fixed in 0.25, though I guess we'll know for sure when it comes out.

Thanks for the reply, guess I'll wait until .25 then.
